description: Discover how to make the best bowl of guacamole using only five fresh ingredients. Serve as a dip or pair with any Mexican-inspired meal such as tacos or burritos.
name: Easy Guacamole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Halve avocados and deseed. Scoop avocado flesh into a large bowl. Using a fork, mash avocado until almost smooth. Add onion, tomato, coriander and lime juice. Stir until well combined. Season and serve.
